Britt Stegers

Eindhoven · Portfolio · brittstegers@gmail.com

I am Britt, a 23-year-old Dutch living in Eindhoven. I am an ex-top handball athlete, a survivor of chronic Lyme disease and a down-to-earth villager who likes to contribute to a more sustainable world. I am a loyal, enthusiastic, social, motivated and an accessible student who would like to get the most out of the studies and meanwhile enjoy it. In my spare time, I like to spend my time mountain biking, cycling, travelling and cooking.

Education

Master of Science Industrial Design

Eindhoven University of Technology

I am currently following a Master of Science in Industrial Design at Eindhoven University of Technology. I am following the track Research Design & Development (RDD) and focus on 3 expertise areas: technology & realization, user & society, and design & research processes. I also participate in 2 certificate programmes: Technology Entrepreneurship & Management and Technology for Sustainable Development. This way, I want to gain knowledge about designing from different perspectives.

February 2021 - Present

Exchange Semester

Politecnico di Milano

In my first year of my bachelor Industrial Design, I visited the Milano Design Week with a organised trip of the study association of Industrial Design. I became very enthusiastic about the city and noticed that the environment inspired me a lot. Because of this inspiring experience and the interesting range of courses they offer at Politecnico di Milano, I decided to go on an exchange semester to Milan. As a student and as a designer, I would like to get the most out of my studies. I saw this exchange as an unique opportunity to broaden my horizon and to gain experience about different cultures and about designing from new perspectives. Besides, I saw this exchange experience as an opportunity to build an international network and to learn about different cultures.

February 2022 - July 2022

Bachelor of Science

Eindhoven University of Technology

I received my Bachelor of Science in Industrial Design from Eindhoven University of Technology. I have developed myself broadly and learned to carry out a design process independently. I developed within six expertise areas determined by the faculty of Industrial Design: user & society, business & entrepreneurship, technology & realisation, math data & computing, creativity & aesthetics, and design & research processes. In my minor, I followed courses at the faculty of Applied Mathematics. Besides, I followed the USE (User, Society and Entrepreneurial perspective) learning line about light.

September 2017 - January 2021

Pre-University education (vwo)

Tabor College Oscar Romero, Beekdal Lyceum, Regius College, Willem Bleau

I completed my pre-university education in a combination with top sports as a handball player. Therefore I had to follow my pre-university eduction at 4 different schools.
Profile: Nature & Health (N&G) and Nature & Technic (N&T)

September 2010 - June 2017

Experience

Student Assistant Calculus

Eindhoven University of Technology

Supporting bachelor students in the first-year course Calculus. As a student assistant/tutor, I prepared the students for the final exam, explained the complex theory again and answered questions about the theory and the homework.

September 2021 - November 2021
September 2020 - November 2020
September 2019 - November 2019

Domestic Worker

TZORG

As I had little time to chat with lonely elderly people during my work as a grocery deliverer, I wanted a job where I could help elderly because I experienced I could make them very happy only with a small talk. That is why I worked half a year at Tzorg as a domestic worker for the elderly.

February 2020 - July 2020

Delivery driver & cashier

Jumbo Supermarkten

At Jumbo Nieuwe Niedorp, I worked as a cashier for the first 2.5 years. After a year, I also became a cashier manager in the evenings and in the weekends. After 2.5 years, grocery delivery became part of Jumbo Nieuwe Niedorp and I became one of the first delivery drivers of Jumbo Nieuwe Niedorp. I still worked occasionally in the cashier department.

December 2015 - August 2020

Additional Activities

Handball Player VZV

Playing in the first team of VZV, located in t' Veld (the Netherlands)

From the age of fifteen, I played in the first team of VZV. In my first official season in the first team, we promoted to the first division and then to the 'premier league' the following year. In my last season, we also qualified for European handball. Due to a persistent injury in my shoulder and Lyme disease, I had to end my career at the age of eighteen.

September 2013 - Feb 2017

Handball Academy

National Sports Centre of the Netherlands: Papendal

Living and training internally at Papendal. During the week, I had 8 trainings at Papendal, 1 training at my club VZV and in the weekends I had a match for VZV.

September 2015 - June 2016

Handball Player Dutch National Youth Teams

Nederlands Handbal Verbond

At the age of fourteen, I was selected for the Dutch National team under 16. We trained weekly at the National Sports Centre of the Netherlands, Papendal. In 2014 I played my first official international match for the Netherlands. In 2015 I participated in the European Qualification Tournament in Georgia. Unfortunately, during the first game of this tournament, I suffered an injury, which meant that I also had to miss the European Championship. Due to Lyme disease and injuries, I decided in May 2016 to stop at Papendal and to stop playing for the Dutch National team under 18.

September 2012 - May 2016
